    • simplify

      public void simplify()
      Simplifies this mixed fraction, converting any improper fractions to mixed numbers if necessary. If the numerator's absolute value is less than the denominator, no simplification is performed.

    • toMixedFraction

      public static MixedFraction toMixedFraction(Fraction improperFraction)

      Returns:
      The equivalent mixed fraction.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Description copied from class: Fraction
      Returns the string representation of the fraction. If the denominator is 0, returns "undefined" (for division). If the numerator is 0 or the denominator is 1, returns only the numerator. Otherwise, returns the fraction in the format "numerator/denominator".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Fraction
      Returns:
      The string representation of the fraction.
